to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent
Meilisi Daur district of Qiqihar city 齊齊哈爾|齐齐哈尔[Qi2 qi2 ha1 er3], Heilongjiang
pinyin: Mei2 li3 si1 Da2 wo4 er3 zu2 qu1

definition: Morin Dawa Daur Autonomous Banner in Hulunbuir 呼倫貝爾|呼伦贝尔[Hu1 lun2 bei4 er3], Inner Mongolia
pinyin: Mo4 li4 Da2 wa3 Da2 wo4 er3 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 qi2
containing_words.word: 莫力達瓦達斡爾族自治旗

definition: Daur language (of Daur ethnic group of Inner Mongolia and Heilongjiang)

sentences.english: Sana is a authoress of Daur who began her writing in early 1990's.
sentences.chinese: 薩娜是於九十年代初走上文壇的達斡爾族當代女作家。

sentences.english: Boyiko is a traditional sport of Daur people.
sentences.chinese: 但其實是達斡爾族傳統的體育項目。

sentences.english: The article discusses the basic information of the Daur Shamanism.
sentences.chinese: 本文論述了達斡爾族薩滿教的基本情況。

sentences.english: It discusses the changes of Daur marriage customs from the several aspects above.
sentences.chinese: 論述了達斡爾婚姻習俗的那幾個方面發生變化。

sentences.english: Bukui was a chief of Daur in Qing dynasty, whose name was widely used.
sentences.chinese: 清代達斡爾首領卜魁擁有一個應用廣泛的名字。

sentences.english: The Daur nationality is one of the minority nationalities in the north of our country.
sentences.chinese: 達斡爾族是我國北方的少數民族之一。

sentences.english: You see this is a traditional Daur house.
sentences.chinese: 你看，這就是達斡爾族的傳統民居。

sentences.english: In religious aspect, the Daur nationality believed mainly Shamanism.
sentences.chinese: 在宗教信仰方面，達斡爾族主要信仰薩滿教。

sentences.english: Why it's not written in Daur?
sentences.chinese: 那怎麼不用達斡爾文寫呢？

sentences.english: What kind of ethnic people are the Daurs?
sentences.chinese: 這達斡爾族是個什麼樣的民族呢？

sentences.english: It is also a traditional Daur sport.
sentences.chinese: 這也是達斡爾族傳統的體育項目。
